trans-unit.source: Ancestor's Chosen
trans-unit.target: 祖灵的爱民

trans-unit.resname: JUD·1 | Ancestor's Chosen | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, you gain 1 life for each card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进场时，在你坟墓场中每有一张牌，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Empowered by generations of strength.
trans-unit.target: 身负积累数代之力。

trans-unit.source: Aven Warcraft
trans-unit.target: 艾文兵法

trans-unit.resname: JUD·2 | Aven Warcraft | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.\nThreshold Creatures you control also gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+0/+2直到回合结束。 门槛～选择一个颜色，由你操控的生物再获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Battle Screech
trans-unit.target: 战呼

trans-unit.resname: JUD·3 | Battle Screech | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put two 1/1 white Bird creature tokens with flying into play.\nFlashback—\nTap three untapped white creatures you control. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色，具有飞行异能的鸟衍生物放置进场。 返照～横置三个由你操控且未横置的生物。（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它移出对战）

trans-unit.source: Battlewise Aven
trans-unit.target: 善战艾文

trans-unit.resname: JUD·4 | Battlewise Aven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nThreshold CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and has first strike. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 门槛～CARDNAME得+1/+1并具有先攻异能。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Experience is a good teacher, not a kind one.
trans-unit.target: 经验是位好老师，但决不温厚。

trans-unit.source: Benevolent Bodyguard
trans-unit.target: 善心护卫

trans-unit.resname: JUD·5 | Benevolent Bodyguard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：选择一种颜色，目标由你操控的生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "My destiny is to save others so their destinies may be achieved."
trans-unit.target: 「我的使命是保护他人，以让他们达成使命。」

trans-unit.source: Border Patrol
trans-unit.target: 边境巡逻队

trans-unit.resname: JUD·6 | Border Patrol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: "We have been victims of treachery, of the Cabal, and of our own ambitions. No more."\n—Commander Eesha
trans-unit.target: 「我们曾因柯帮，甚或自身的背叛而深受其害。这一切都将不再。」 ～伊夏指挥官

trans-unit.source: Cagemail
trans-unit.target: 槛子甲

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and can't attack.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物得+2/+2且不能进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: "Power often costs too high a price."\n—Commander Eesha
trans-unit.target: 「力量的代价往往高得难以承受。」 ～伊夏指挥官

trans-unit.source: Chastise
trans-unit.target: 惩戒

trans-unit.source: Destroy target attacking creature. You gain life equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标进行攻击的生物。你获得等同于其力量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "Why do we pray to the Ancestor? Because She listens."\n—Mystic elder
trans-unit.target: 「为何要向圣祖灵祷告？因为她必细心聆听。」 ～秘教长老

trans-unit.source: Commander Eesha
trans-unit.target: 伊夏指挥官

trans-unit.resname: JUD·9 | Commander Eesha | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from creatures
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反生物保护

trans-unit.source: "War glides on the simplest updrafts while peace struggles against hurricane winds. It is the way of the world. It must change."
trans-unit.target: 「战争循流遨翔，和平却在暴风中挣扎。世道就是如此。这必须改变。」

trans-unit.source: Funeral Pyre
trans-unit.target: 葬火

trans-unit.resname: JUD·10 | Funeral Pyre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game. Its owner puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 将目标在坟墓场中的牌移出对战。该牌的拥有者将一个1/1白色、具有飞行异能的精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "Raze the body. Raise the soul."\n—Mystic elder
trans-unit.target: 「灰烬入土，灵魄升天。」 ～秘教长老

trans-unit.source: Glory
trans-unit.target: 荣耀

trans-unit.source: Flying\no2o\nW: Creatures you control gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Play this ability only if CARDNAME is in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 二白：选择一种颜色。由你操控的生物获得反该色保护异能直到回合结束。你只可于CARDNAME在你坟墓场中时使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Glory was gone; Glory was everywhere."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
trans-unit.target: 「荣耀已逝；荣耀无所不在。」 ～诸始经

trans-unit.source: Golden Wish
trans-unit.target: 富贵祈愿

trans-unit.resname: JUD·12 | Golden Wish | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an artifact or enchantment card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 从对战外选择一张由你拥有的神器或结界牌，展示该牌，然后将之置于你手上。将CARDNAME移出对战。

trans-unit.source: She wished for nobility, but not for a nation to honor it.
trans-unit.target: 她祈求尊荣，却无国以贵。

trans-unit.source: Guided Strike
trans-unit.target: 神助一击

trans-unit.resname: JUD·13 | Guided Strike | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+1/+0并获得先攻异能直到回合结束。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "May the Ancestor strengthen my hand and guide my blade."\n—Nomad war prayer
trans-unit.target: 「愿圣祖灵强健吾臂，导引吾剑。」 ～游牧人战场祷文

trans-unit.source: Lead Astray

trans-unit.resname: JUD·14 | Lead Astray | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Tap up to two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 横置至多两个目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "Never underestimate our enemy's strength, brutality, . . . or stupidity."\n—Commander Eesha
trans-unit.target: 「别小看了敌人的力量，野蛮，…或是愚蠢。」 ～伊夏指挥官

trans-unit.source: Nomad Mythmaker
trans-unit.target: 牧民神话诗人

trans-unit.resname: JUD·15 | Nomad Mythmaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nW, oc\nT: Put target enchant creature card from a graveyard into play enchanting a creature you control. (You control that enchantment.)
trans-unit.target: 白，ocT：将目标在坟墓场中的生物结界牌移回场上，并结附于由你操控的生物上。（你操控该结界。）

trans-unit.source: Nomads weave tales thicker than tapestries.
trans-unit.target: 游牧人编织传说，比挂毡更密实。

trans-unit.source: Phantom Flock
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战群

trans-unit.resname: JUD·16 | Phantom Flock | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME comes into play with three +1/+1 counters on it.\nIf damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进场时上面有三个+1/+1指示物。 若CARDNAME将受到伤害，则防止该伤害。从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Phantom Nomad
trans-unit.target: 幽魅游牧人

trans-unit.resname: JUD·17 | Phantom Nomad | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with two +1/+1 counters on it.\nIf damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进场时上面有两个+1/+1指示物。 若CARDNAME将受到伤害，则防止该伤害。从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·18 | Prismatic Strands | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that sources of the color of your choice would deal this turn.\nFlashback—\nTap an untapped white creature you control. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 选择一种颜色。于本回合中，防止该色来源将造成的所有伤害。 返照～横置一个由你操控且未横置的白色生物。（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它移出对战）

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Return three target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: ocT：将三张目标在对手坟墓场中的牌移回其手上。将目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌移回场上。

trans-unit.source: "Our unity revives our hopes."
trans-unit.target: 「吾等万众一心，希望必得重燃。」

trans-unit.target: 揭露之光

trans-unit.resname: JUD·20 | Ray of Revelation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target enchantment.\nFlashback o\nG (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标结界。 返照绿（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它移出对战）

trans-unit.resname: JUD·20 | Ray of Revelation | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Webs of illusion unravel in the light of truth.
trans-unit.target: 幻象之网为真实之光拆散。

trans-unit.target: 无私的驱魔师

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game. That card deals damage equal to its power to CARDNAME. (A * on a card not in play is 0.)
trans-unit.target: ocT：将目标在坟墓场中的生物牌移出对战。该牌对CARDNAME造成等同于该牌力量值的伤害。（不在场上的牌，其上的*均为0）

trans-unit.target: 盾法师倡导人

trans-unit.resname: JUD·22 | Shieldmage Advocate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Return target card in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn by a source of your choice.
trans-unit.target: ocT：将目标在对手坟墓场中的牌移回其手上。选择一个来源。于本回合中，防止该来源将对目标生物或牌手造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Our unity conquers all fears."
trans-unit.target: 「吾等万众一心，疑惧必被战胜。」

trans-unit.target: 银翎炽天使

trans-unit.source: Flying\nThreshold Other creatures you control get +2/+2. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 门槛～其他由你操控的生物得+2/+2。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.
trans-unit.target: 绝望时刻的希望象征。

trans-unit.source: Solitary Confinement
trans-unit.target: 单独拘禁

trans-unit.resname: JUD·24 | Solitary Confinement | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you discard a card from your hand.
Skip your draw step.
You can't be the target of spells or abilities.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，除非你从手上弃掉一张牌，否则牺牲CARDNAME。 略过你的抓牌步骤。 你不能成为咒语或异能的目标。 防止将对你造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.target: 捕灵手巢窝

trans-unit.resname: JUD·25 | Soulcatchers' Aerie | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Bird is put into your graveyard from play, put a feather counter on CARDNAME.\nAll Birds get +1/+1 for each feather counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一鸟从场上置入你的坟墓场时，在CARDNAME上放置一个飞羽指示物。 CARDNAME上每有一个飞羽指示物，所有的鸟便得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: Spirit Cairn
trans-unit.target: 灵冢

trans-unit.resname: JUD·26 | Spirit Cairn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player discards a card from his or her hand, you may pay o\nW. If you do, put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手从手上弃掉一张牌时，你可以支付白。若你如此作，将一个1/1白色、具有飞行异能的精怪衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: It marks the border between here and hereafter.
trans-unit.target: 标记了今世与来生之交界。

trans-unit.source: Spurnmage Advocate
trans-unit.target: 摈法师倡导人

trans-unit.resname: JUD·27 | Spurnmage Advocate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Return two target cards in an opponent's graveyard to his or her hand. Destroy target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: ocT：将两张目标在对手坟墓场中的牌移回其手上。消灭目标进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Our unity humbles our foes."
trans-unit.target: 「吾等万众一心，敌雠必将屈膝。」

trans-unit.source: Suntail Hawk
trans-unit.target: 旭羽翔鹰

trans-unit.resname: JUD·28 | Suntail Hawk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "Our forebears once flew like this—carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing."\n—Commander Eesha
trans-unit.target: 「我们的祖先也曾这般地翱翔云端～逍遥自在，除安居与温饱外别无所求。我等的智能说是天赋，可能还更近于负担吧。」 ～伊夏指挥官

trans-unit.resname: JUD·29 | Test of Endurance | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 耐力试炼

trans-unit.resname: JUD·29 | Test of Endurance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你的总生命为50或更多，则你赢得此盘对战。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·29 | Test of Endurance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If we have learned nothing else, we have learned to survive."\n—Mystic elder
trans-unit.target: 「若我辈未能从中学到别的教训，至少也学会了如何生存。」 ～秘教长老

trans-unit.source: Discard a card from your hand: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上弃掉一张牌：于本回合中，防止将对CARDNAME造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: "The desert asked the Ancestor for children, and the antelope were born."\n—Nomad myth
trans-unit.target: 「沙漠向圣祖灵要求子息，羚羊是以诞生。」 ～游牧人神话

trans-unit.source: Unquestioned Authority
trans-unit.target: 至上权威

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, draw a card.\nEnchanted creature has protection from creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，抓一张牌。 受此结界的生物具有反生物保护异能。

trans-unit.source: "Only the Ancestor should be revered."\n—Mystic heretic
trans-unit.target: 「惟有圣祖灵得无上尊崇。」 ～秘教异端

trans-unit.source: Valor
trans-unit.target: 骁勇

trans-unit.source: First strike\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard and you control a plains, creatures you control have first strike.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 只要CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，并且你操控平原，由你操控的生物便具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: "The cracks widened, the shell crumbled, and Valor spread throughout the land."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
trans-unit.target: 「裂隙逐渐张开，外壳为之碎裂，骁勇从此遍布大地。」 ～诸始经

trans-unit.resname: JUD·33 | Vigilant Sentry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Threshold CARDNAME gets +1/+1 and has "oc\nT: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 门槛～CARDNAME得+1/+1并具有「ocT：目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物得+3/+3直到回合结束。」（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Aven Fogbringer
trans-unit.target: 扬雾艾文

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, return target land to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，将目标地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "I cover the land with blankets and it sleeps."
trans-unit.target: 「我为大地覆毡，她随之酣眠。」

trans-unit.source: Cephalid Constable
trans-unit.target: 𫠒人保安官

trans-unit.resname: JUD·35 | Cephalid Constable | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, return up to X target permanents that player controls to their owners' hands, where X is the damage it dealt to that player.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将X个目标由该牌手操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上，X为CARDNAME对该牌手造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Cephalids don't police people. They police loyalties.
trans-unit.target: 𫠒人不管理人的治安。他们要管的是忠诚问题。

trans-unit.source: Cephalid Inkshrouder
trans-unit.target: 墨遁𫠒人

trans-unit.source: Discard a card from your hand: CARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities and is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 从你手上弃掉一张牌：于本回合中，CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标，并且不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: Cephalids shrink from the harsh glare of scrutiny.
trans-unit.target: 𫠒人在严密的检视下消逝无踪。

trans-unit.source: Cunning Wish

trans-unit.source: Choose an instant card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 从对战外选择一张由你拥有的瞬间牌，展示该牌，然后将它置于你手上。将CARDNAME移出对战。

trans-unit.source: He wished for knowledge, but not for the will to apply it.
trans-unit.target: 他祈求知识，却无意活用。

trans-unit.source: Defy Gravity
trans-unit.target: 反抗重力

trans-unit.resname: JUD·38 | Defy Gravity | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.\nFlashback o\nU (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。 返照蓝（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它移出对战）

trans-unit.source: Magical or not, it's still a cloud.
trans-unit.target: 无论是否出于法术，云就是云。

trans-unit.source: Envelop
trans-unit.target: 封存

trans-unit.source: Counter target sorcery spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标法术咒语。

trans-unit.source: "What you made will be unmade. What you learned will be unlearned. And when you're done, you will be undone."\n—Ambassador Laquatus
trans-unit.target: 「你创造的都归于空无。你学会的均不复纯熟。当你完成时，将一如什么都没发生。」 ～大使拉夸塔

trans-unit.resname: JUD·40 | Flash of Insight | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 洞察乍现

trans-unit.resname: JUD·40 | Flash of Insight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Look at the top X cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.\nFlashback—o1o\nU, Remove X blue cards in your graveyard from the game. (You can't remove CARDNAME to pay for its own flashback cost.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶上的X张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置于你的牌库底。 返照～一蓝，从你的坟墓场中将X张蓝色牌移出对战。（你不能将CARDNAME本身移出对战来支付本身的返照费用）

trans-unit.resname: JUD·41 | Grip of Amnesia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grip of Amnesia
trans-unit.target: 失忆之攫

trans-unit.resname: JUD·41 | Grip of Amnesia | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller removes his or her graveyard from the game.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标咒语之操控者将其坟墓场移出对战，否则反击该咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·41 | Grip of Amnesia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Would you abandon your past to save your future?"\n—Ambassador Laquatus
trans-unit.target: 「你可愿放弃过去以挽救未来？」 ～大使拉夸塔

trans-unit.source: Hapless Researcher
trans-unit.target: 倒楣的研究者

trans-unit.resname: JUD·42 | Hapless Researcher | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌，然后从你手上弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars possess such lofty knowledge that it shouldn't be surprising when they fall.
trans-unit.target: 既然学者们的智识如此高深，摔下来时也没啥好讶异的。

trans-unit.source: Keep Watch
trans-unit.target: 守候

trans-unit.resname: JUD·43 | Keep Watch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 每有一个进行攻击的生物，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."
trans-unit.target: 「我看到他们的犹疑不决。我看到他们的无谋勇气。我看到他们的自我牺牲。我预料吾等胜利可期。」

trans-unit.source: Laquatus's Disdain
trans-unit.target: 拉夸塔的鄙视

trans-unit.resname: JUD·44 | Laquatus's Disdain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell played from a graveyard.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标从坟墓场中使用的咒语。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The first time was amusing, but now you're getting tiresome."
trans-unit.target: 「第一次还挺有些看头，但现在可没意思透啦。」

trans-unit.resname: JUD·45 | Lost in Thought | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lost in Thought
trans-unit.target: 深陷思绪

trans-unit.resname: JUD·45 | Lost in Thought | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be played. Its controller may remove three cards in his or her graveyard from the game to ignore this ability until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，并且不能使用其起动式异能。该生物的操控者可以从他坟墓场中将三张牌移出对战，以忽略此异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Mental Note
trans-unit.target: 读心记事

trans-unit.resname: JUD·46 | Mental Note | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 将你牌库顶上的两张牌置入你的坟墓场。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Some minds are more open than others.
trans-unit.target: 有些心灵就是比较开放。

trans-unit.source: Mirror Wall
trans-unit.target: 镜墙

trans-unit.resname: JUD·47 | Mirror Wall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)\no\nW: CARDNAME may attack this turn as though it weren't a Wall.
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击） 白：CARDNAME本回合可以如同不是墙地进行攻击。

trans-unit.source: "Breaking it would be about four hundred years bad luck."\n—Nomad sentry
trans-unit.target: 「砸破它的人会倒上八辈子楣。」 ～游牧人哨兵

trans-unit.resname: JUD·48 | Mist of Stagnation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mist of Stagnation
trans-unit.target: 滞雾

trans-unit.resname: JUD·48 | Mist of Stagnation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.\nAt the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a permanent for each card in his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 永久物于其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手的坟墓场中每有一张牌，他便重置一个永久物。

trans-unit.source: Quiet Speculation
trans-unit.target: 静默冥思

trans-unit.resname: JUD·49 | Quiet Speculation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search target player's library for up to three cards with flashback and put them into that player's graveyard. Then the player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 从目标牌手的牌库中搜寻至多三张具有返照异能的牌，并将这些牌置入该牌手的坟墓场。然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "The best foresight is hindsight."\n—Empress Llawan
trans-unit.target: 「先知先觉总是比不过事后诸葛。」 ～𫠒人女皇菈菀

trans-unit.source: Scalpelexis
trans-unit.target: 史卡佩雷克斯

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player removes the top four cards of his or her library from the game. If two or more of those cards have the same name, repeat this process.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手将他牌库顶上的四张牌移出对战。若该些牌中有两张或更多牌具有相同的名称，则重复此程序。

trans-unit.source: Spelljack
trans-unit.target: 劫咒

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If it's countered this way, remove it from the game instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. As long as it remains removed from the game, you may play it as though it were in your hand without paying its mana cost. If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。若该咒语以此法被反击，则将该咒语移出对战，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。只要该牌保持在被移出对战的状态，你便可将它视为在你手上一般地使用，且不须支付其法术力费用。若该牌之法术力费用中含有X，则X为0。

trans-unit.source: Telekinetic Bonds
trans-unit.target: 念力羁绊

trans-unit.resname: JUD·52 | Telekinetic Bonds | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player discards a card from his or her hand, you may pay o1o\nU. If you do, tap or untap target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手从手上弃掉一张牌时，你可以支付一蓝。若你如此作，则横置或重置目标永久物。

trans-unit.source: "Nature's been fired. The oceans are under new management."\n—Ambassador Laquatus
trans-unit.target: 「大自然给解雇了。海洋正由新任者管理。」 ～大使拉夸塔

trans-unit.resname: JUD·53 | Web of Inertia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Web of Inertia
trans-unit.target: 迟钝之网

trans-unit.resname: JUD·53 | Web of Inertia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each opponent's combat phase, that player may remove a card in his or her graveyard from the game. If the player doesn't, creatures he or she controls can't attack you this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的战斗阶段开始时，该牌手可以从他坟墓场中将一张牌移出对战。若该牌手未如此作，则由他操控的生物本回合不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·53 | Web of Inertia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Cephalids specialize in lose-lose situations.
trans-unit.target: 𫠒人擅长于双输局面。

trans-unit.source: Wonder
trans-unit.target: 神奇

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard and you control an island, creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 只要CARDNAME在你坟墓场中，并且你操控海岛，由你操控的生物便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "The awestruck birds gazed at Wonder. Slowly, timidly, they rose into the air."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
trans-unit.target: 「鸟儿敬畏地凝视神奇。缓缓地，轻轻地，他们都升入空中。」 ～诸始经

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Behemoth
trans-unit.target: 奇肢贝西摩斯

trans-unit.resname: JUD·55 | Wormfang Behemoth | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove all cards in your hand from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed cards to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将你的手牌移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Crab
trans-unit.target: 奇肢蟹

trans-unit.resname: JUD·56 | Wormfang Crab | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, an opponent chooses a permanent you control and removes it from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。 当CARDNAME进场时，一位对手选择一个由你操控，并且不是CARDNAME的永久物，并将其移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Drake
trans-unit.target: 奇肢龙兽

trans-unit.resname: JUD·57 | Wormfang Drake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, sacrifice it unless you remove a creature you control other than CARDNAME from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，除非你将一个CARDNAME以外且由你操控的生物移出对战，否则牺牲CARDNAME。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Manta
trans-unit.target: 奇肢𫚉

trans-unit.resname: JUD·58 | Wormfang Manta | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME comes into play, you skip your next turn.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, you take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进场时，你略过你的下一个回合。 当CARDNAME离场时，你在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Newt
trans-unit.target: 奇肢水蝾

trans-unit.resname: JUD·59 | Wormfang Newt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将一个由你操控的地移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Spawned by mages emulating the insane.
trans-unit.target: 法师仿照狂乱之形而作。

trans-unit.source: Wormfang Turtle
trans-unit.target: 奇肢龟

trans-unit.resname: JUD·60 | Wormfang Turtle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove a land you control from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, return the removed card to play under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将一个由你操控的地移出对战。 当CARDNAME离场时，将以此法移出对战的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回场上。

trans-unit.source: Chainer's admirers keep his dreams alive.
trans-unit.target: 敬奉崔纳的人们使他的梦想持续下去。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·61 | Balthor the Defiled | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Balthor the Defiled
trans-unit.target: 污秽的巴铎

trans-unit.resname: JUD·61 | Balthor the Defiled | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
All Minions get +1/+1.
o
Bo
Bo
B, Remove CARDNAME from the game: Each player returns all black and all red creature cards from his or her graveyard to play.
trans-unit.target: 所有奴仆得+1/+1。 黑黑黑，将CARDNAME移出对战：每位牌手从其坟墓场中将所有黑色和／或红色的生物牌移回场上。

trans-unit.resname: JUD·61 | Balthor the Defiled | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: He remembers enough of his life to weep for what he has lost.
trans-unit.target: 他所能忆起的过往人生，足够让他为所失去的部分悲叹不已。

trans-unit.source: Cabal Therapy
trans-unit.target: 柯帮疗法

trans-unit.resname: JUD·62 | Cabal Therapy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Name a nonland card. Target player reveals his or her hand and discards from it all cards with that name.\nFlashback—\nSacrifice a creature. (You may play this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 说出一张非地的牌之名称。目标牌手展示其手牌，并从中弃掉所有该名称的牌。 返照～牺牲一个生物。（你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它移出对战）

trans-unit.source: Cabal Trainee
trans-unit.target: 柯帮学员

trans-unit.resname: JUD·63 | Cabal Trainee | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, a faceshredder. Very rare. Nearly unstoppable. Good luck!"\n—Cabal instructor
trans-unit.target: 「啊，这叫做扯脸怪。非常少见；几乎无人能敌。祝好运！」 ～柯帮指导员

trans-unit.source: Death Wish
trans-unit.target: 致命祈愿

trans-unit.resname: JUD·64 | Death Wish | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose a card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. You lose half your life, rounded up. Remove CARDNAME from the game.
trans-unit.target: 从对战外选择一张由你拥有的牌，并且置于你手上。你失去一半生命，小数点后进位。将CARDNAME移出对战。

trans-unit.source: He wished for power, but not for the longevity to abuse it.
trans-unit.target: 他祈求力量，却无福消受。

trans-unit.source: Earsplitting Rats
trans-unit.target: 刺耳鼠

trans-unit.resname: JUD·65 | Earsplitting Rats | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, each player discards a card from his or her hand.\nDiscard a card from your hand: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每位牌手各从手上弃掉一张牌。 从你手上弃掉一张牌：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Rats come in one amount: too many.
trans-unit.target: 老鼠的数量从来都只会太多。

trans-unit.source: Filth
trans-unit.target: 污孽

trans-unit.source: Swampwalk\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard and you control a swamp, creatures you control have swampwalk.
trans-unit.target: 沼泽行者 只要CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，并且你操控沼泽，由你操控的生物便具有沼泽行者异能。

trans-unit.source: "As the portal closed, Filth oozed through. The stench of evil followed it in."\n—*Scroll of Beginnings*
trans-unit.target: 「在时空通道关闭的前一刻，污孽蹑脚溜了进来。奸邪之气也随著悄悄渗入。」 ～诸始经

trans-unit.source: Grave Consequences
trans-unit.target: 坟场影响力

trans-unit.resname: JUD·67 | Grave Consequences | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each player may remove any number of cards in his or her graveyard from the game. Then each player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手可以从其坟墓场中将任意数量的牌移出对战。然后对每位牌手而言，在他坟墓场中每有一张牌，他便失去1点生命。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "You call *that* a nightmare?"\n—Braids, dementia summoner
trans-unit.target: 「你觉得这样就算是梦魇啦？」 ～惧像召唤师布蕾德

trans-unit.source: Guiltfeeder
trans-unit.target: 罪业啜兽

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks and isn't blocked, defending player loses 1 life for each card in his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被神器和／或黑色生物阻挡。 每当CARDNAME进行攻击且未受阻挡时，防御牌手的坟墓场中每有一张牌，他便失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Masked Gorgon
trans-unit.target: 覆面蛇发妖

trans-unit.resname: JUD·69 | Masked Gorgon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Green creatures and white creatures have protection from Gorgons.\nThreshold CARDNAME has protection from green and from white. (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 绿色生物及白色生物具有反蛇发妖保护异能。 门槛～CARDNAME具有反绿保护及反白保护异能。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Morality Shift
trans-unit.target: 道德转换

trans-unit.resname: JUD·70 | Morality Shift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exchange your graveyard and library. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 将你的坟墓场与牌库互换。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The mind sings, though at times it sings a dirge.
trans-unit.target: 心灵有时也会唱诵著挽歌。

trans-unit.source: Rats' Feast
trans-unit.target: 鼠群盛宴

trans-unit.resname: JUD·71 | Rats' Feast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove X target cards in a single graveyard from the game.
trans-unit.target: 将X张目标在单一坟墓场中的牌移出对战。

trans-unit.source: "That does it—I quit!"\n—Cabal grave robber
trans-unit.target: 「够了～我不干啦！」 ～柯帮盗墓者

trans-unit.source: Stitch Together
trans-unit.target: 缝接

trans-unit.resname: JUD·72 | Stitch Together | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.\nThreshold Instead return that card from your graveyard to play. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌移回你手上。 门槛～改为将该牌移回场上。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Sutured Ghoul
trans-unit.target: 缝组食尸鬼

trans-unit.resname: JUD·73 | Sutured Ghoul | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nAs CARDNAME comes into play, remove any number of creature cards in your graveyard from the game.\nCARDNAME's power is equal to the total power of the removed cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness. (A * on a card not in play is 0.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 于CARDNAME进场时，从你坟墓场中将任意数量的生物牌移出对战。 CARDNAME的力量等同于以此法移出对战之牌力量的总和，且其防御力等同于以此法移出对战之牌防御力的总和。（不在场上的牌，其上的*均为0）

trans-unit.source: Toxic Stench
trans-unit.target: 剧毒恶臭

trans-unit.resname: JUD·74 | Toxic Stench | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target nonblack creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nThreshold Instead destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. (You have threshold if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 目标非黑色的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 门槛～改为消灭该生物。它不能重生。（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Treacherous Vampire
trans-unit.target: 无节吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: JUD·75 | Treacherous Vampire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks or blocks, sacrifice it unless you remove a card in your graveyard from the game.\nThreshold CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 6 life."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME进行攻击或阻挡时，除非你从你坟墓场中将一张牌移出对战，否则牺牲之。 门槛～CARDNAME得+2/+2并具有「当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，你失去6点生命。」

trans-unit.source: Treacherous Werewolf
trans-unit.target: 无节狼人

trans-unit.resname: JUD·76 | Treacherous Werewolf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Threshold CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "When CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from play, you lose 4 life." (You have threshold as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 门槛～CARDNAME得+2/+2并具有「当CARDNAME从场上置入坟墓场时，你失去4点生命。」（只要在你的坟墓场中有七张或更多的牌，你便达到门槛。）

trans-unit.source: Anger
trans-unit.target: 愤怒

trans-unit.source: Haste\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard and you control a mountain, creatures you control have haste.
